name: DivvyHQ
author: Alluresoft, LLC

sections.description:
This plugin is only for existing DivvyHQ customers. After installation,
users can decide if they want to sync their WordPress content, published
URL and status back to the corresponding Content Item in DivvyHQ. If
syncing needs to be turned off for any reason, the WordPress setting can
be changed and syncing will temporarily (or permanently) be disabled.

This plugin requires the JWT Authentication for WP REST API plugin.

For information on how to use this plugin, please visit the help.divvyhq.com.
sections.installation:
There are no special steps for installing Divvy’s plugin. Install this
plugin just as you would any other WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
Do I have to have a DivvyHQ Account to use the plugin?

Yes. And your DivvyHQ must be either a Pro or Enterprise level account.
sections.changelog:

1.0.2

Set JWT Secret Key to WP constant and configure .htaccess.

1.0.1

Update to webhook URL.

1.0.0

Initial release.

short_description: DivvyHQ users can use this plugin to sync their WordPress posts back to their DivvyHQ Content Item.
